alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 10:14AM EST until January 29 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Michigan... Grand River at Portland affecting Ionia County. Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. .Recent rainfall and warmer temperatures have caused significant rises on area rivers and that water is now working its way downstream. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sycamore Creek at Holt. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river, in the Lansing Municipal Golf Course and sections of East Mt. Hope Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Sunday was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 5.2 feet Sunday, February 04. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet on 06/24/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. this morning at 1115 AM EST.
